name: CCRI 1931 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1931 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1931 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CD_1931_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1931 Census division (CD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CSD_1931_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1931 Census subdivision (CSD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_digitized_published_tables.pdf
distribution.description: Summary of all tables from the 1911 to 1951 censuses digitized by the CCRI.

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1931_v2t21.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1931, Vol. 2, Table 21. Title: Population, Canadian, British and Foreign born, classified by sex, for municipalities, townships or other subdivisions, 1931. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1931. Seventh Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 21, pp. 164-249. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1931_v2t33.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1931, Vol. 2, Table 33. Title: Population classified according to principal origins for municipalities, etc., 1931. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1931. Seventh Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 33, pp. 320-493. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1931_v2t42.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1931, Vol. 2, Table 42. Title: Population classified according to principal religions for municipalities, etc., 1931. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1931. Seventh Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 42, pp. 534-696. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1931_v5t49.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1931, Vol. 5, Table 49. Title: Buildings (containing dwellings), dwellings and households, classified as rural and urban, for counties and census divisions, 1931. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1931. Seventh Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 5, Table 49, pp. 944-949. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1931.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1931 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CSD_1931.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1931 Census at the Census subdivision (CSD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.
